Daniel Benson (amụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 14 n'ọnwa Mee n'afọ 1997) nke a maara dịka Bnxn (nke a na-akpọ Benson) na onye a maara dị ka Buju, bụ onye Naijiria na-agụ egwu Afro-fusion, onye na-ede egwu na onye na-emepụta ihe ndekọ.
A mụrụ ya na Lagos, Naijiria
O si na steeti Akwa Ibom
Bnxn bụ onye Afro-fusion na-agụ egwu na onye na-ede egwu

Ọ na arụ ọrụ na Burna Boy's Spaceship Records.
Ya na ezinụlọ ya tolitere na Gbagada, kwaga Ogun Steeti.
Sorry I'm Late bụ ọrụ mgbatị (EP) nke Buju, ewepụtara ya na 27 Ọktoba afọ 2021, n'okpuru njikwa nke T.Y.E / EMPIRE
Ọ na-egosi ndị ọbịa sitere na Nigerian Highlife music duo, The Cavemen, na mmepụta site na Steph, Perlz, Denzl, Timi Jay na Rexxie

Ọ bụ Vtek na Poppil gwakọtara ya ma mara ya nke ọma. Motolani Alake nke Pulse Nigeria kwuru na ọ "na-egosi obi ike, mmeri na 'nkasi obi'. Buju mere ihe ngosi mbụ ya na London na onwa Nọvemba 30, na-egosi mmalite nke njem Sorry I'm Late.
N'abalị iri abụọ na abụọ n'ọnwa Disemba afọ 2021, Buju mere egwu mbụ ya rere ere, nke bụkwa egwu izizi ya na Legos.
Na afọ 2022, Buju gbanwere aha ya na BNXN.
